properties.entry: SELECT * FROM PLAYLIST WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY PLAYLIST_NO

SELECT P.PLAYLIST_NO, PT.TRACK_NO, M.MUSIC_NO, P.PLAYLIST_NO, U.USER_NO, P.PLAYLIST_TH, P.PLAYLIST_SUBJECT, M.MUSIC_TITLE, M.MUSIC_CHANGENAME , M.MUSIC_PATH , AL.ALBUM_PIC_PATH || AL.ALBUM_CHANGENAME ALBUM_IMG, AR.ARTIST_NAME, NVL2(LM.MUSIC_NO ,1 ,0) MLIKE FROM PLAYLIST P JOIN PLAYLIST_TRACK PT ON P.PLAYLIST_NO = PT.PLAYLIST_NO JOIN MUSIC M ON PT.MUSIC_NO = M.MUSIC_NO JOIN ALBUM AL ON AL.ALBUM_NO=M.ALBUM_NO JOIN ARTIST AR ON AL.ARTIST_NO = AR.ARTIST_NO JOIN DEBUG_USER U ON U.USER_NO = P.USER_NO LEFT JOIN LIKE_MUSIC LM ON LM.MUSIC_NO = M.MUSIC_NO WHERE P.PLAYLIST_NO = ? ORDER BY PT.TRACK_NO

SELECT M.MUSIC_NO , M.MUSIC_TITLE, M.MUSIC_CHANGENAME , M.MUSIC_PATH , AL.ALBUM_PIC_PATH || AL.ALBUM_CHANGENAME ALBUM_IMG, AR.ARTIST_NAME, NVL2(LM.MUSIC_NO ,1 ,0) MLIKE FROM MUSIC M JOIN ALBUM AL ON AL.ALBUM_NO=M.ALBUM_NO JOIN ARTIST AR ON AL.ARTIST_NO = AR.ARTIST_NO LEFT JOIN LIKE_MUSIC LM ON LM.MUSIC_NO = M.MUSIC_NO WHERE M.MUSIC_NO = ?
DELETE FROM LIKE_MUSIC WHERE USER_NO = ? AND MUSIC_NO = ?
